org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.interceptor

Interface InterceptionContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArtifactInterceptionContext, LifecycleEventType, MessageInterceptionContext

    public interface InterceptionContext
    The interception context that describes the nature of the interceptor, what to be intercepted. This context is also used to give the interception event context to the interceptor implementation
    Since:
    2.1.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean matches(InterceptionContext context)
      Checks whether this context matches the criteria in the given context.

    • Method Detail

      • matches

        boolean matches(InterceptionContext context)
        Checks whether this context matches the criteria in the given context. Implementations should make sure that this behaves exactly the same for 2 contexts that are equal and or a supper set of the other. This is analogues to the String.matches(String) method where the object on which the operation is called is expected to be treated as the concrete object while the argument passed to this method is treated as the criteria (equivalent of the regex in the case of String.matches)
        Parameters:
        context - the context criteria to be matched
        Returns:
        true if this context matches the given context criteria or false otherwise
